game.name: DCS: Mi-8 MTV2 Magnificent Eight
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: DCS: Mi-8MTV2 Magnificent Eight is a highly realistic PC simulation of the Mi-8MTV2, a combat transport and fire support helicopter and an upgraded variant of one of the most widely produced helicopters in the world - the Russian Mi-8 (NATO reporting name ‘Hip’).
game.shortDescriptionEn: DCS: Mi-8MTV2 Magnificent Eight is a highly realistic PC simulation of the Mi-8MTV2, a combat transport and fire support helicopter and an upgraded variant of one of the most widely produced helicopters in the world - the Russian Mi-8 (NATO reporting name ‘Hip’).
